resources.string: CUREYA (registered as Aspexx Health solutions Pvt Ltd ) collaborated with stakeholders include - ROOTSKILLS , ROOTSAPS , World Yoga associations , Flagbits technologies and many more . The recent online webinars are conducted by alternative practitioners that include - Ayurveda Experts , Energy Healing experts , Mental Health Counselors etc. CUREYA primarily objective is ‘ Health for All ‘ , by reducing the medical expenditure , eliminating the information asymmetry , promoting health awareness and achieving inclusive and holistic approach for healthcare treatments.
Made with love in india to empower healthcare services.
This is a sample message that will appear
This action requires authentication. Proceed to sign out?
Are you sure you want to sign out?
Help you to make schedule for yoga

1) Vitality in Individuality: Cureya focuses on creating a safe space for you to learn,understand and get expert help on all health-related concerns. Our network of professionals provide expert solutions customized just for you.

2) Everyone is Priority With Cureya: We aim to increase the accessibility of high quality holistic health solutions and provide affordable solutions to all. Everyone is priority and our two-way conversation system ensures learning, healing and growing.

3) Patient- Practitioner Connect: Cureya focuses on the right connections and integrates patients with practitioners. Our online network of practitioners allows us to provide the right treatment, transcending barriers of geography to provide superior quality.

4) Previous teachings, today solutions: Our evidence based research allows us to bridge the gap between traditional and modern medical systems. By leveraging technology to revamp the traditional medical system, Cureya provides transformative healthcare.

5) Priority not Privilege: Cureya garners the belief that healthcare is an inclusive, fundamental right to all. Health is a priority and by making healthcare solutions accessible to all, Cureya aims to improve the standard of living for health and well being.
We thrive to achieve “Health for all” and aim to have a well balanced integrated, holistic and sustainable healthcare system through health education, promotion and prevention.

We thrive to create an integrated, holistic, inclusive and sustainable healthcare system providing personalized healthcare.We strive on maintaining our community of experienced professionals and transcend geographical barriers.
● Achieving a high quality healthcare system through a well balanced network of healthcare specialists and wellness practitioners
● Integrating passion and technology with innovation and marketing to increase accessibility and create a sustainable healthcare system.
● To create a well developed community of professionals and maintain this network with the ethos of the healthcare system, upholding the values of integrity, honesty and trust.
● Developing an individualistic, transformative healthcare system for patients by including customized monitoring and wellness plans.

Cureya aims to develop a transformative healthcare system through a network of professionals providing affordable, expert solutions that are individualized with customized healthcare and wellness plans.
● Cureya creates a safe space and focuses on enhancing Vitality by utilizing nature and the various benefits from it. Special focus is placed on cure, prevention and mitigation.

● Cureya provides individualized, transformative healthcare and leverages technology to revamp the traditional medical system and globalize local knowledge. Bridging this gap allows Cureya to leverage knowledge regarding the use of indigenous medicinal plants and traditional healers through advanced technologies and sustaining the global interest towards natural healing and organic solutions.

● The new wave of natural healing and herbal medicines creates a need for learning and trends indicate a high demand towards holistic healthcare solutions. Cureya fulfills this through evidence based research incorporated in clinical practice and transcends barriers of geography by the usage of modern technology.
● Collaborated with prestigious universities. (IIT’s, NIT’s, IIM’s, Central Universities and more)
● Launched AI Mental Health Chatbot for individualized care on Google Play Store
● Conducted 20+ National and International Live Webinars with experienced doctors.
● Member of INO (International Naturopathy Organization), Google Women Founders Group, Stanford Rebuild, NASSCOM & ASSOCHAM
● Provide online internship programs for engineering and medical students on AI-ML-DS-PYTHON
● 1500+ students have become part of the Cureya Online Internship Program
● Interns working all over India with team sizes over 150 in over 10 departments.

Cureya will directly act as the HEALTH PARTNER for these institutions

1. Customer base in collaboration with Institutes and Corporates

2. MOU agreements are Under Process for colleges JSS NOIDA PARTNER

3.UPTU college

4.GNIOT Engineering & 5 other Engineering Colleges

MOUs are UNDER PROCESS for Corporates :
 HCL

● Associate partner or Social Media Partner.
● List and Market your products on our E-Commerce portal.
● Conduct and partake in webinars, podcasts and certification courses.
● Collaborate with esteemed universities, industry partners and corporates.
● Share your knowledge by starting your own certification course for practitioners.
